name: verdant-lawncare-platform
description: AI-powered lawncare and landscaping business platform with Node.js + FastAPI

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:node" "npm run dev:python"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd services/api && npm install && cd ../api/python && python -m venv venv && ./venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup:python: cd services/api/python && python -m venv venv && ./venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt
